DeviceHandler.handler:
set_xp_tx_video_parm true MODIFY ORB-500-Device > V2D-XP200-Device V2D-XP200S-Device V2D-XP220-Device V2D-XP220S-Device V2D-XP100-Device V2D-XPi-Device //V2DEncoderVideoConfig

noise_fine NoiseElimination/Fine

vertical_position Position/Vertical
lut_cpmp LUTPumpCurr
optimize_latency AdvancedVideoEncoderConfig/OptimizeLatency
